description:
Having turned into cats, Gintoki and the gang are brought to Otose snack house by Hoichi. As the cats scarf down some food, Otose warns them that if they get caught, they can never return to this town. Seems there is someone egging the townspeople to hunt and capture the town’s stray cats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freedom Means to Live True to Yourself, Not Without Law!
Jiyuu to wa Muhou de wa Naku Onore no Rule de Ikiru Koto
自由とは無法ではなく己のルールで生きること
